7.9 Anāsādoḷasaka
Kathinakkhandhaka
Anāsādoḷasaka
318.
1469Bhikkhu atthatakathino cīvarāsāya pakkamati. So bahisīmagato taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati. Tassa evaṃ hoti—  “idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti. So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa bhikkhuno niṭṭhānantiko kathinuddhāro. (1)

1481Anāsādoḷasakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
